attribution_ratio = #{attributionRatio,jdbcType=DOUBLE},

frequency_num_ip = #{frequencyNumIp,jdbcType=INTEGER},

filter_app = #{filterApp,jdbcType=INTEGER},

dx_dmp = #{dxDmp,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

= #{dxChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dx_ggw_level_id = #{dxGgwLevelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dx_ggw_series_id = #{dxGgwSeriesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dx_ggw_price_tag_id = #{dxGgwPriceTagId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select p.id id,p.put_name putName,p.run_state runState
,ap.`name` adPositionName,zd.dic_value zdlxName,zxxs.dic_value showName
,p.price price,p.delivery_mode deliveryMode,p.put_limit putLimit, pl.plan_name planName, cust.full_name adverName,cost.dic_value costTypeName,p.put_state putState
from put p
left join plan pl on p.pid = pl.id left join company cust on pl.adver_id = cust.id left join dictionary cost on p.cost_type = cost.id
left join ad_position ap on p.ad_position = ap.id left join dictionary zd on ap.terminal = zd.id left join dictionary zxxs on ap.type = zxxs.id
where 1=1
and pl.adver_id = #{custId}
and pl.adver_id in
#{cust}
and p.put_state in
#{putState}
and p.put_state != 0
and p.create_user in
#{uid}
order by p.run_state desc,p.id desc
limit ${start},${limit}
select count(p.id) from put p where 1=1
